title: Vehicle plate numbers font ID
content:
Hello:

I was wondering if any of you have seen a font similar to this:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821070325im_/http:/typophile.com/files/numbers_4728.jpg)

It doesn't have to be the exact type, just something to look alike, but if you know the original would be great!!

Thanks!

Q™ says: It's all about the fonts...
author: Qdzign.com.mx

comments.content: That's not a very friendly license place.

Hello:

Thanks for the input, the font suggested it's actually pretty good, but maybe some other option a little less squared would be great!!

And yes, not a very friendly combination, but you can expect almost anything down here in mexico :-S

Q™ Says: It's All About The Fonts!
